content.rendered: This Suntory expression is a special release featuring beautiful artwork and a handmade kutani ceramic container. It comes with an original box and certificate. The whisky within is, of course, a blend of Suntory’s most premium malt and grain whiskies. With a very limited number of bottles ever released, it’s a rare one through and through.

excerpt.rendered:
Distillery: Suntory
Whisky Origin: Japanese
Alcohol Strength: 40%
Bottle Size: 600ml
Weight: 3.5 Kg
